poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: I'm burning the Xmas flab in thinking through What Ed said: it's the wrong folks Are having babies, driving down the general IQ. Surely it's more that high IQs Are going to the wrong folks? Or even That high IQ's the problem: What's the cleverest species? And which one Is focusing the blowlamp on the little rubber pipe? Pour another shot or two of that fab- ulous, liquid crystal, fire-blue Oaxacan hootch.
